== Event : ISITCOM 11.04 - Atomcell ==
=== 1. Introduction ===
     {*} Ubuntu and free software Day in ISITCOM H.S, the event was prepared by the club" free software Free Your Mind".

     {*} The event contained three conferences and install party.
